name: Strawberry Me
description:
This game was made while a gamejam with the theme of the well known song "Strawberry field forever" by the Beatles. In this game you are a woman that goes back to the orphanage, she was when she was young, and find some objects that remember her her youth.

For yet there is only one object.

Controls :

Q,D : move

Space : Jump (only as young girl)

S : Roll (only as young girl)

Casting:

Graphs :

- Aurélien BOYFFARD

- Béatrice BEAUVAL

GameDesign:

- Frédéric LEGER

Programming:

- Benjamin LEFEVRE
